name: Ikkoku Bridge to DreamLand
description:
This is a crypitic surreal co-op puzzle game inspired by BOMBERMAN and LSD DREAM SIMULATOR.

No explanations are given to the player about how to play it or what to do, it's all up to you to experiment and find out how the game works.

controls:
player 1: wasd; space; E;

player 2: arrows; numpad0; numpad2;

obs: make sure numpad lock button is active or the second player controls might not work

this is version 1.1
